channel.title: Entree on Nhuyhoa Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Entree on Nhuyhoa Recipes

item.title: Alfredo Dairy-Free
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit cashews japanese sweet potato date garlic powder onion miso paste mushroom seasoning nutritional yeast pepper salt soy milk

item.title: Banh Canh (Vietnamese Thick Noodle Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit banh canh chicken bones bean sprouts fish sauce chicken feet chives msg chicken wings cilantro pepper dried shrimp daikon salt dried squid garlic shallot oil pork belly ginger sugar pork bones green onions wonton soup base pork feet hanh kho pork hock onion pork rib tips shallot shrimp vietnamese coriander

item.title: Banh Cuon (Vietnamese Steamed Rice Rolls)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam pha cha bean sprouts oil shrimp cucumber rice flour dried fungus mushroom salt green onions shandong noodles hanh kho soy sauce lettuce tapioca starch mint wonton soup base shallot thai basil

item.title: Banh Mi
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit banh mi cha carrot five spice powder pate cilantro maggi seasoning pork belly cucumber mayonnaise daikon pepper shallot salt sugar vinegar

item.title: Banh Xeo (Vietnamese Crepes)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit beer pork belly bean sprouts nuoc mam pha shrimp green onions oil lettuce pepper mint rice flour onion salt perilla tapioca starch shallot turmeric

item.title: Bap Cai Luoc (Cabbage and Egg Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam eggs cabbage Instructions instructions Hard boil egg Cut up and boil cabbage Mash up egg and add nuoc mam & water Save the veggie broth and eat/drink as a canh

item.title: Bo Bia (Spring Rolls with Chinese Sausage)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun eggs cucumber hoisin sauce lap xuong (chinese pork sausages) lettuce peanut butter mint rice paper thai basil Instructions instructions Boil lap xuong for 15 min, move to ice bath when done Make thin egg omeletes, one egg at a time Slice sausages and eggs Prepare the bun Prepare the veggies To make sauce, golden shallots and onions then dilute hoisin sauce and peanut butter with broth until the taste is right Make rolls

item.title: Bo Xao Khoai Tay Chien (Beef and French Fries Stir Fry)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit oyster sauce beef cilantro pepper fries salt garlic mushroom onion shallot tomato

item.title: Bun Cha Gio (Vietnamese Egg Rolls and Noodles)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun ground chicken carrot mien ground pork cucumber nuoc mam pha shrimp dried fungus mushroom lettuce mint perilla shallot

item.title: Bun Mang Vit (Vietnamese Duck Noodle Soup with Bamboo Shoot)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun duck bamboo shoots chicken broth cilantro pepper ginger salt green onions wonton soup base shallot Instructions instructions Defrost and clean duck with salt and water Cut off the duck head, cut open stomach and take out internal organs Slice duck by thighs to make it easier to cook Marinate duck with salt, pepper, and minced shallots Add duck and parts to boiling water, use just enough water to just cover the duck Peel and smash ginger, add to pot Boil duck on medium or low heat with the cover on, want a light boil for a total of 1 hour Periodically skim off foam and remove clumps Can check on status by stabbing chicken in breast/thigh with chopstick and ensuring there are no red streaks Take out duck and cut up the meaty parts, put bony parts back into broth Maintain a slow boil of broth, add chicken broth to desired level and add wonton soup base Adjust broth to taste, should taste salty Slice bamboo shoots into strips and clean Blanche bamboo strips Add bamboo into broth Cut up duck and refrigerate Serve bun with duck, green onions, cilantro, broth, and nuoc mam pha with ginger

item.title: Bun Rieu (Vietnamese Crab Noodle Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun eggs bean sprouts chicken broth ground chicken cilantro crab paste ground pork green onions mam tom shrimp lettuce salt tofu mint wonton soup base tofu puffs onion tofu puffs shallot tomato water spinach

item.title: Bun Thit Nuong (Vietnamese Grilled Pork and Noodles)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun pork shoulder butt cucumber honey garlic nuoc mam green onions nuoc mam pha lemongrass pepper lettuce sugar mint perilla shallot

item.title: Ca Chien (Fried Fish)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam pha catfish garlic pepper shallot salt Instructions instructions Cut catfish approximately 3 in long Marinate fish in salt, pepper, minced shallots and garlic Place in fridge for a half hour Fry both sides of fish on medium heat Eat with nuoc mam pha

item.title: Ca Kho (Braised and Carmelized Catfish)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam catfish onion pepper shallot salt Instructions instructions Marinate catfish chunks with salt, pepper, and shallots Warm up pot with oil enough to cover the bottom of the pot Add a few spoons of sugar and heat on medium heat, stirring until fully liquid and light brown Take off heat and stir in minced shallots Put pot back on burner and stir for few more minutes until shallots golden Pour in some nuoc mam Layer the pan bottom with yellow onion strips and sprinkle in pepper Layer fish on top of onions Add water up to top level of fish Cook on medium for 30 min Add nuoc mam for flavor Cook on low heat for 30 min until reduce 50% of liquid

item.title: Ca Nuc (Mackerel)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam pha mackerel fish lemongrass pepper onion salt shallot Instructions instructions Cut fish from butt to head, remove fins, tail, gills, gut, head, etc Wash fish by rubbing softly with vinegar and salt Marinate with conservative amounts of salt and pepper If wanted, stuff with lemongrass and onions Steaming: steam fish for 20-25 min Grilling: broil on high heat, skin down, for a few minutes, then flip for another minute Frying: pan fry on medium heat with shallots, skin down & flip midway until internal temperature sufficient Eat with nuoc mam pha

item.title: Ca Nuc Mackerel in Miso Sauce
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit miso mackerel fish ginger sake soy sauce sugar Instructions instructions Cut 1 mackerel into 4 piece filets and cut cross incision on the skin Bring to a boil 0.

item.title: Canh Bau (Opo Squash Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth pork rib tips cilantro fish sauce shrimp green onions mushroom seasoning opo squash pepper shallot salt Instructions instructions Season meat with salt, pepper, and shallots Season squash (cut into strips or cubes) with salt and pepper Saute minced shallots until slightly golden Stir in meat and squash Add water/broth, adjust to taste with various seasonings Simmer for 5-10 min In last few minutes, add green onions and cilantro

item.title: Canh Ca Chua Dau Hu (Tofu and Tomato Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam fish tofu cilantro wonton soup base pork rib tips garlic tofu green onions tofu puffs onion shallot tomato

item.title: Canh Cai Cuc (Chrysanthemum Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth ground chicken chrysanthemum wonton soup base ground pork shallot Instructions instructions Saute minced shallots until slightly golden Stir fry ground pork until no longer pink Add an equal amount of water and chicken broth Season with wonton soup base Adjust broth to taste, want it light Cut chrysanthemums (cai cuc, tung ho) into 3 in lengths, use the stems if they are tender enough Add steams first then leaves Bring to a small simmer and then remove from heat

item.title: Canh Cha Ca (Fish Cake Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam cha ca (fish paste) dill wonton soup base green onions onion shallot tomato Instructions instructions Heat yellow onion, shallots, and tomatoes in pot on medium heat When tomatoes have softened, add 1 bowl of water Add cha ca Add wonton soup base and nuoc mam, adjust to taste Simmer for 15 minutes Add dill and green onions in the last few minutes

item.title: Canh Chua Ca (Sweet and Sour Fish Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam catfish bean sprouts pineapple pepper elephant ear stem salt garlic sugar green onions tamarind okra rice paddy herbs tomato

item.title: Canh Dua Chua (Pickled Mustard Green Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth beef rough flank dua chua nuoc mam pha pork belly shallot wonton soup base tomato Instructions instructions Stir minced shallots until golden in a pot on medium heat Put in thinly sliced meat (leave beef flanks in large strips) and stir for about 5 min, want it mostly cooked Add in a little bit of water and simmer for 5-10 min on low Mix in sliced tomatoes and dua cha Stir well for a few minutes Put in 2:1 ratio of chicken broth and water, may also add dua chua liquid of desired Add wonton soup base When soup starts to boil, turn to low, cover with lid and let it sit for 20 min Add nuoc mam pha Adjust to taste, want it sweet and sour

item.title: Canh Khoai Mo (Ube Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth shrimp rice paddy herbs pepper shallot salt ube wonton soup base Instructions instructions Process peeled shrimp, salt, pepper, and shallots Saute minced shallots until slightly golden Add shrimp mixture Add chicken broth and wonton soup base Bring to a boil, then lower heat Add mashed ube (khoai mo bao) and simmer Add rice paddy herbs (ngo om) in the last few minutes

item.title: Canh Khoai Tay Suon (Taro and Pork Rib Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth pork rib tips japanese sweet potato macaroni rice paddy herbs pepper shallot salt taro wonton soup base Instructions instructions Marinate the pork rib tips with salt and pepper Add one layer of pork and sear both sides until golden; do not crowd pan, use multiple batches if needed Golden minced shallots Add water or chicken broth and adjust to medium high heat Add sweet potato and simmer until cooked If cooking with taro, boil in a separate pot due to shorter cooking time Add wonton soup base, adjust to taste Add rice paddy herbs (ngo om) in the last few minutes Eat with rice or nui

item.title: Canh Muop Mong Toi (Spinach and Luffa Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit pepper dried shrimp malabar spinach salt shallot wonton soup base taiwanese okra Instructions instructions Soak dried shrimp in hot water and mash dried shrimp Stir fry taiwanese okra (luffa) & shallots with salt & pepper Add bowl of dried shrimp & additional water Add wonton soup base Add malabar spinach prior to boiling Adjust to taste as necessary Canh spoils easily, so refridgerate when cool

item.title: Canh Rau Ram
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth beef shank onion pepper shallot salt vietnamese coriander wonton soup base Instructions instructions Slice shanks and season with salt and pepper Golden shallots and onions Sear meat Add water and adjust to taste with various seasonings Simmer until cooked Add chopped raw ram in last few minutes

item.title: Cauliflower Soup
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bread cauliflower lime chicken broth chives gold raisins cilantro ground coriander dill ground cumin garlic pepper mint salt onion yogurt shallot

item.title: Cha (Vietnamese Ham)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit baking powder pork shoulder garlic fish sauce shallot msg sugar tapioca starch Instructions instructions Process 1 lb pork shoulder (partially frozen), shallots and garlic Add a mixture of 1 tbsp sugar, 2 tbsp tapioca starch, 0.

item.title: Cha Ca (Fish Cake)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam basa catfish dill nuoc mam pha shrimp garlic pepper onion salt shallot sugar tapioca starch

item.title: Chao (Porridge)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit gio chao quay chicken ginger jasmine rice green onions pepper shallot salt wonton soup base Instructions instructions Marinate chicken with salt, pepper & shallots Make rice Boil chicken until sufficient internal temp Add rice, smashed ginger, and boil until it has expanded (~1 hr) Add wonton soup base Eat with pepper, green onions, shredded chicken, gio chao quay

item.title: Chawanmushi
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit broth egg chives gelatin corn green onions mushroom seaweed Instructions instructions Prepare broth ahead of time, broth should be well seasoned and to taste Mix 1 beaten eggs : 3 broth Strain mixture to remove air bubbles Steam under gentle heat (light boil) for 10 min Add some fillings such as corn, mushrooms, seaweed, chives, green onions, etc Steam for another 5 min (total 15 min) Remove from heat Top with sauce made from stock mixed with gelatin Garnish with herbs & seaweed Serve while still warm

item.title: Com Chien (Fried Rice)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken powder eggs garlic any pepper any onion rice shallot salt any soy sauce Instructions instructions Make rice with less rice or use day-old rice that is dry Prepare and cook the meat and veggies, drying thoroughly Saute minced shallots, garlic, and onions until slightly golden Add eggs on low power Add salt, pepper, soy sauce Scramble eggs and add moderate amount of rice Stir fry rice and add seasonings (salt, pepper, soy sauce, chicken powder) to liking Once rice is done (fried and toasty), stir in meat and veggies

item.title: Dau Hu Sot Ca Chua (Fried Tofu with Tomato Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam tofu garlic green onions onion tomato Instructions instructions Fry tofu Saute onions, garlic, and tomato in a pot When tomatoes have softened, add very small bowl of water Add fried tofu Add with nuoc mam and water for flavor Add a starch slurry and simmer for 15 min Add green onions in last few minutes

item.title: Dau Hu Teriyaki (Teriyaki Tofu)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit teriyaki sauce tofu Instructions instructions Fry tofu Set tofu aside and allow oil to drain Simmer teriyaki sauce on medium heat until the sauce becomes thick Add tofu and coat with sauce

item.title: Dau Hu Xao Hanh (Stir Fried Tofu and Green Onions)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam tofu green onions shallot Instructions instructions Cut shallots and green onions Make a 1:1 mixture of water and nuoc mam in a small bowl Fry tofu Saute minced shallots until slightly golden Add green onions and stir until they soften Add tofu and sauce mixture Stir and adjust to taste, remove from heat after a few minutes

item.title: Dau Xanh Xao (Green Bean Stir Fry)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit oyster sauce garlic pepper green bean salt hanh kho mushroom onion shallot Instructions instructions Steam green beans for about half the cook time Saute minced shallots and garlic until slightly golden Stir in green beans, mushrooms, and sliced onion until soft Drizzle in diluted oyster sauce (1:1 ratio)

item.title: Dim Sum Veggies
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit oyster sauce bok choy soy sauce chinese broccoli sugar garlic wonton soup base Instructions instructions Blanche bok choy Mix 3 oyster sauce : 1 soy sauce : 2 sugar, and some wonton soup base or water Saute minced garlic until slightly golden Stir fry bok choy for a couple minutes Add water and steam for a couple minutes Arrange on plate and drizzle with sauce

item.title: Dua Chua (Pickled Mustard Greens)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit brown sugar green onions salt mustard greens Instructions instructions Cut mustard greens Using the white parts of the green onions, cut into quarter circles Mix 1.75 tbsp brown sugar, 1 tbsp salt, and 1L of warm water Before adding the salt and water, squeeze the brown sugar and green onions Taste mixture, should be sweet and sour Add mustard green leaves Squeeze the mixture Pour mixture into a container and tightly seal Store in a warm place for a few days Try a piece, want it to be sweet and sour Place in fridge when it has the desired taste

item.title: Dumplings
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken boullion chicken thighs green onions fish sauce pork shoulder shallot oil shrimp water chestnuts oyster sauce pepper salt soy sauce sugar vinegar wonton egg wrappers

item.title: Eggs Omelette
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit mien eggs dried fungus mushroom nuoc mam pha ground pork onion pepper shallot salt soy sauce Instructions instructions Soak mien and a few fungus separately in boiling water for a couple minutes, drain, rinse and repeat Combine eggs and mixed fillings Saute minced shallots until slightly golden Add egg mixture Cook both sides until golden Serve with nuoc mam pha

item.title: Ga Bourbon
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bourbon chicken thigh onion brown sugar shallot corn starch five spice powder hoisin soy sauce sugar

item.title: Ga Ca Ri (Vietnamese Chicken Curry)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit baguette chicken carrot chicken broth corn chicken powder garlic curry powder ginger pepper lemongrass salt potato wonton soup base shallot sweet potato

item.title: Ga Chicken Tikka Masala
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit coriander powder chicken cilantro garam masala garlic mustard powder ginger naan bread onion paprika tomato salt sugar turmeric yogurt

item.title: Ga Chien Nuoc Mam (Fried Chicken Fish Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam chicken garlic pepper sesame oil sugar Instructions instructions Marinate chicken with minced garlic, black pepper, and a pinch of sesame oil Fry chicken Boil mixture with ratio 1.

item.title: Ga Chien Xi Dau (Fried Chicken Soy Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit pepper chicken shallot salt soy sauce Instructions instructions Marinate chicken with salt, pepper, shallots, and soy sauce Fry chicken on medium low heat

item.title: Ga Luoc Cham Nuoc Mam Gung (Boiled Chicken with Ginger Fish Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam pha chicken ginger Instructions instructions Boil deboned chicken thighs under a light boil until internal temperature hits 165F Refrigerate chicken Eat with nuoc mam cha mixed with ginger

item.title: Ga Teriyaki
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit pepper chicken thigh salt teriyaki sauce Instructions instructions Debone skin-on chicken thighs and prick both sides of chicken with fork Salt chicken and let sit for a while to drain water Marinate chicken with salt and pepper On medium high heat, cook chicken skin-side down (no oil) until crispy then flip and cook until fully cooked Cut chicken with scissors into bit-sized pieces and pour sauce on top

item.title: Ga Xao Sa Ot (Lemongrass Stir Fried Chicken)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken boullion chicken thigh chili pepper fish sauce garlic oyster sauce lemongrass sugar shallot turmeric Instructions instructions Mince shallots, lemongrass, garlic, and hot pepper Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces Marinate with a ratio of 1 chicken bouillon : 1 sugar : 3 fish sauce : 1 oyster sauce : 0.

item.title: Galbitang (Korean Beef Short Rib Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit fish sauce beef short ribs daikon pepper garlic salt green onions sesame oil onion soy sauce seaweed thick glass noodles shallot

item.title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes (with Gravy and Hot Honey Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit apple cider vinegar garlic bourbon potato butter shallot chicken broth cumin flour honey milk mustard powder paprika pepper salt sugar tomato powder

item.title: Goi (Salad)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit apple cider vinegar lettuce pepper onion salt tomato sugar Instructions instructions In a small bowl, mix sugar, apple cider vinegar, sliced yellow onion, and pinch of black pepper Slice tomatoes and sprinkle with salt and sugar Cut lettuce to bite-sided pieces Mix tomatoes, lettuce and sauce Serve with rice and a meat dish

item.title: Goi Cuon (Spring Rolls)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun pork belly cucumber hoisin sauce shrimp lettuce peanut butter mint rice paper thai basil salt Instructions instructions Boil pork belly for a few minutes and then dump liquid Boil pork belly with salt on medium high heat for ~30 min Boil shell-on shrimp on medium heat until pink, then remove shell Slice pork belly and shrimp Prepare the bun Prepare the veggies To make sauce, golden shallots and onions then dilute hoisin sauce and peanut butter with broth until the taste is right Make rolls

item.title: Goi Cuon Cham Mam Nem
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit bun beef cucumber pineapple butter shrimp garlic mam nem squid lemongrass rice paper lettuce sugar mint shallot thai basil

item.title: Goi Ga (Vietnamese Chicken Salad)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam pha chicken cabbage pepper any hanh kho roast peanut onion salt thai basil sugar vietnamese coriander vinegar

item.title: Goi Salsa (Salsa)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit pepper cabbage avocado salt cilantro lime sugar corn mandarin orange cucumber mango edamame any lettuce mint red onion tomato any

item.title: Kothu Parotta
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit garam masala egg cilantro ground coriander cilantro ground cumin cucumber leftover curry sauce dill parotta garlic pepper ginger salt mint yogurt onion tomato

item.title: Mam Tom Chung (Shrimp Paste Ground Meat)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit black pepper ground chicken cucumber mam tom ground pork lemongrass sugar shallot Instructions instructions Saute minced shallots and lemongrass until slightly golden Stir in ground meat, breaking up into small chunks Stir on medium heat until no longer pink Drain meat juices Add in ratio of 1 sugar : 0.

item.title: Mi Hoanh Thanh (Wonton Noodle Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth ground pork bok choy mi pork xa xiu chives oyster sauce shrimp cilantro pepper green onions salt hanh kho sesame oil mustard greens soy sauce shallot sugar water chestnuts wonton soup base wonton wrappers

item.title: Mi Vit Quay (Roast Duck Noodle Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth roast duck chives mi hanh kho wonton soup base lettuce mustard greens Instructions instructions Buy a whole roast duck at a Chinese barbecue restaurant Cut up the roast duck, save the bony parts for the broth and refrigerate the rest Fill large pot 1/4 full with water, add bony duck parts, and sauce (comes with duck) When the broth starts to boil, fill 3/4 pot with chicken broth and add wonton soup base Want the broth to maintain a light boil Wash and cut veggies Boil the lettuce and mustard greens Stir fry washed/dried mi until it is a little crunchy, sprinkle with some soy sauce and chives Eat with mi, veggies, roast duck, broth, and hanh kho

item.title: Mi Xao (Stir Fried Noodles)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit mi any bean sprouts oyster sauce broccoli pepper cabbage salt carrot chives garlic green onions hanh kho mushroom okra onion shallot any

item.title: Mien Ga (Vietnamese Chicken Glass Noodle Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit fish sauce chicken bones chives date mien chicken feet cilantro msg chicken gizzard dried fungus mushroom pepper chicken thigh garlic salt ginger shallot oil green onions sugar hanh kho wonton soup base onion shallot vietnamese coriander

item.title: Mint Pea Soup
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit chicken broth garlic ground coriander mint ground cumin onion pepper pea salt shallot yogurt Instructions instructions Caramelize onion and shallots with a sprinkle of salt Once browned, add minced garlic and ground coriander & cumin Add peas and chicken broth to just cover, adjust to taste Simmer until peas are cooked (2-4 min) Cool then blend with mints and a spoon of yogurt until smooth Adjust to taste with salt & pepper Garnish with sliced mint

item.title: Muc Xao (Squid Stir Fry)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit oyster sauce squid chinese celery pineapple pepper garlic salt shallot Instructions instructions Clean squid well, cut patterns into patterned chunks or circles Marinate squid with black pepper and a little salt Cut chinese celery into inch long segments and cut pineapple into thin chunks Saute minced shallots and garlic until slightly golden Add squid, discarding any water that comes out from the squid Stir in pineapple and chinese celery Add diluted oyster sauce, when squid is done (changes from translucent color to white) Adjust to taste

item.title: Nui (Macaroni Soup)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit macaroni pork rib tips mustard greens pepper shallot salt wonton soup base Instructions instructions Make pork broth with pork rib tips Boil mustard greens in pork broth Make macaroni noodles separately Eat noodles with pork, greens, and broth

item.title: Pesto
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit cashews basil date nutritional yeast cilantro lime olive oil dill any pepper garlic salt mint soy milk vietnamese coriander any

item.title: Poke Bowl
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit Tamaki Gold California Koshihikari short grain rice eel green onions eel sauce salmon fish hanh kho sesame oil shrimp tempura onion soy sauce Instructions instructions Cook short grain rice with half amount of water as usual Mix 2 vinegar : 1 sugar : pinch salt into rice after done cooking Marinate cubed salmon in mix of 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp mirin, 1 tsp sesame oil, sliced onion and green onion Add other ingredients if desired (Goi Salsa) Eat with rice

item.title: Rau Muong Xao Toi (Stir Fried Water Spinach)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit mam tom garlic shallot water spinach Instructions instructions Blanche water spinach (rau muong, ong choy) until texture is sufficiently cooked/crunchy, stems should go longer than leaves Saute minced shallots and garlic until slightly golden Add in water spinach Stir in diluted mam tom Stir fry for few minutes Save liquid used for blanching for canh

item.title: Roast Sweet Potato
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit Kerrygold butter japanese sweet potato Penzeys Paris Seasoning onion garlic powder white miso Instructions instructions Preheat oven to 450F Poke the japanese sweet potato with a fork Bake for 30-45 min Make miso butter by 1 miso : 2 butter (unsalted) Steam sliced onions in microwave with miso butter for 10 min Spread miso butter on roast sweet potato with paris seasoning / garlic powder Eat roast potato with onions

item.title: Shrimp Burger
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit brioche bun TJ shrimp burger lettuce mayo mushroom onion tomato Instructions instructions Cook shrimp burger patty, onions, and mushrooms Toast buns Assemble burger

item.title: Shrimp Po Boy
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit Kim Thu Thap Bot Chien shrimp lettuce baguette tomato mayo sweet chili sauce Instructions instructions Make shrimp tempura according to the Kim Tu That Bot Chien instructions Toast baguette Assemble Po Boy with baguette, mayo, lettuce, tomato, shrimp tempura drizzled with sweet chili dipping sauce

item.title: Steak
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit butter beef ribeye steak garlic garlic powder shallot msg pepper salt Instructions instructions Rub seasonings on 1.

item.title: Thit Heo Luoc Cham Tom Mam (Pork Belly with Fermented Shrimp Paste)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit mam tom pork belly pepper salt Instructions instructions Marinate pork belly with salt and pepper Blanche meat, then dump liquid and thoroughly rinse to remove impurities Boil pork belly with more marinade on medium high heat ~60 min, then move to ice bath Slice pork belly Serve with tom mam sauce

item.title: Thit Heo Quay (Roast Pork Belly)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit baking soda pork belly lime coarse salt fish sauce five spice powder garlic powder salt shaoxing wine sugar vinegar

item.title: Thit Kho (Braised and Carmelized Pork Belly with Eggs)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam eggs shallot pepper pork belly salt Instructions instructions Marinate pork belly cubes with salt, pepper, and shallots Warm up pot with oil enough to cover the bottom of the pot Add a few spoons of sugar and heat on medium heat, stirring until fully liquid and light brown Take off heat and stir in minced shallots Put pot back on burner and stir for few more minutes until shallots golden Pour in some nuoc mam Stir fry in pork belly Add water up to top level of pork Cook on medium for 2 hours, removing meat foam Hard boil eggs and add that to pot Add nuoc mam for flavor Cook on low heat for 30 min until reduce 50% of liquid

item.title: Thit Ram or Suon (Carmelized Pork Spare Ribs or Belly)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit cornstarch pork belly green onions pepper pork rib tips onion salt shallot soy sauce sugar vinegar

item.title: Thit Tom Rang (Pork and Shrimp Stir Fry)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit nuoc mam pork belly garlic pepper shrimp green onions salt onion sugar shallot Instructions instructions Want a ratio of 2 shrimp : 1 pork belly sliced Season both lightly with salt, pepper, and shallots Saute minced shallots and garlic until slightly golden Stir fry pork until no longer pink Stir in shrimp Add a ratio of 1 sugar : 1 nuoc mam, with some water Simmer for 10 min Add in sliced yellow onion and minced green onions Cover and wait a few minutes to fully cook

item.title: Thit Xa Xiu (Char Siu Pork)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit five spice powder pork shoulder butt garlic garlic powder hoisin sauce honey msg oyster sauce pepper sesame oil shaoxing wine soy sauce sugar

item.title: Tom Rang Me (Shrimp in Tamarind Sauce)
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit cornstarch shrimp cabbage nuoc mam ginger pepper green onions salt onion sugar shallot tamarind Instructions instructions Make sauce using ratio of 2 sugar : 2 tamarind concentrate : 1 nuoc mam; should taste sweet and sour Marinate shrimp with salt, pepper, shallots and cornstarch Prepare the veggies Saute minced shallots and garlic until slightly golden Add sauce and simmer until thick Add shrimp and stir until mostly cooked Stir in cabbage Turn off heat and add yellow and green onion Cover for few minutes

item.title: Xoi Man
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit salt chicken garlic sweet rice lap xuong (chinese pork sausages) green onions yuk (pork floss) hanh kho shallot Instructions instructions Wash sweet rice and drain Add hot water, just enough to cover rice, and cook in rice cooker Mix sweet rice when it is rice Stir fry chicken and shred into pieces Boil lap xuong for 15 min and cut into slices Saute minced shallots and garlic until slightly golden Add minced green onions a few minutes before taking off heat Plate sweet rice, layer with yuk, chicken, lap xuong, stir fried veggies, and hanh kho

item.title: Xoi Vo
item.description: Ingredients Other Meat Veggie Fruit peeled mung bean cha hanh kho salt sweet rice Instructions instructions Want a ratio of 3 sweet rice : 1 peeled mung bean Rinse and soak each separately in cold water overnight Rinse and and drain separately Let the rice sit and dry while you work on the mung beans Steam mung bean for 15-20 min, it should hold its shape but can be smashed between fingers Granulate mung been until powdery Mix rice with mung bean, 1 tbsp salt, and 1 tsp oil Steam for 60 min Take it out and let it cool, want it to be dry and well separated Eat with cha, hanh kho or che hoa cau
